name: Hendricks Park
overview:
Hendricks Park is a luxury clothing service for men who have better things to do with their time than shop for clothes.

Hendricks Park serves a niche demographic of men who value the convenience of having a Personal Style Expert select clothing just for him, coordinate it into outfits, send it anywhere in the US and Canadaâ€”and provide honest feedback via Skype on how it actually looks.

Hendricks Park offers an edited selection of top quality brands and unique products at boutique pricing. Round trip shipping is complimentary. While they don’t have minimum requirements, Hendricks Park likes to be transparent and explain they aren’t a discount service. The Hendricks Park man typically spends at least $1,200 per season on clothes.

For more information about Hendricks Park, visit www.hendrickspark.com
